test-set.name: prod-CountClause
test-set.description: Tests for the CountClause production in XQuery 3.0

test-case.name: count-003
test-case.description: count clauses in a nested for loop
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 4 count $ix for $y in $x to 3 count $iy return <item><x>{$x}</x><ix>{$ix}</ix><y>{$y}</y><iy>{$iy}</iy></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-004
test-case.description: count clauses in a nested for loop with allowing empty
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 4 count $ix for $y allowing empty in $x to 3 count $iy return <item><x>{$x}</x><ix>{$ix}</ix><y>{$y}</y><iy>{$iy}</iy></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-005
test-case.description: Use of a count clause in a filter
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 5 for $y in 1 to 5 count $index where $index mod 3 = 0 return <item><x>{$x}</x><y>{$y}</y><index>{$index}</index></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-006
test-case.description: Use of a count clause in a filter
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 5 for $y in 1 to 5 count $index where $index mod 3 = 0 count $index2 return <item><x>{$x}</x><y>{$y}</y><index2>{$index2}</index2></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-007
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 5 for $y in 1 to 5 count $index where $index mod 3 = 0 count $index return <item><x>{$x}</x><y>{$y}</y><index>{$index}</index></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-008
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 2 for $y in 1 to 3 let $index := $y count $index return <item><x>{$x}</x><y>{$y}</y><index>{$index}</index></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-009
test-case.description: Using a count clause with order-by
test-case.test: <out>{ for $x in 1 to 4 for $y in 1 to 4 count $index let $remainder := $index mod 3 order by $remainder, $index count $index2 return <item><x>{$x}</x><y>{$y}</y><remainder>{$remainder}</remainder><index2>{$index2}</index2></item> }</out>

test-case.name: count-010
test-case.description: Count is reset on each execution of a FLWOR expression
test-case.test: for $x in 1 to 4 return for $y in 1 to 4 count $index return $index
